verses.verse: Now will I <S%H7891>sing<s%> to my <S%H3039>wellbeloved<s%> a <S%H7892>song<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> touching his <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>. My <S%H3039>wellbeloved<s%> has a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> in a very <S%H1121>fruitful<s%> <S%H7161>hill<s%>:

And he <S%H5823>fenced<s%> <S%H5619>it<s%>, and gathered out the stones <S%H5193>there<s%>, and planted it with the choicest <S%H8321>vine<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H4026>tower<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H2672>it<s%>, and also made a <S%H3342>winepress<s%> in <S%H6960>it<s%>: and he looked that it should bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and it brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes<s%>.
And <S%H3427>now<s%>, O inhabitants of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%>, I pray <S%H3754>you<s%>, between me and my vineyard.

What could have been <S%H6213>done<s%> more to my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H4069>it<s%>? therefore, when I <S%H6960>looked<s%> that it should bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, brought it <S%H6213>forth<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes<s%>?

And now go <S%H3045>to<s%>; I will tell you what I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>: I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H4881>hedge<s%> <S%H1197>there<s%>, and it shall be eaten up; and break <S%H6555>down<s%> the <S%H1447>wall<s%> <S%H4823>there<s%>, and it shall be trodden down:

And I will <S%H7896>lay<s%> it <S%H1326>waste<s%>: it shall not be <S%H2168>pruned<s%>, nor <S%H5737>dug<s%>; but there shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%>: I will also <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> that they <S%H4305>rain<s%> no rain upon <S%H4306>it<s%>.

For the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H8191>pleasant<s%> <S%H5194>plant<s%>: and he <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, but behold <S%H4939>oppression<s%>; for <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, but behold a <S%H6818>cry<s%>.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that <S%H5060>join<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1004>house<s%>, that <S%H7126>lay<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H7704>field<s%>, until there be <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, that they may be <S%H3427>placed<s%> alone in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>!

In my <S%H241>ears<s%> said the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Of a <S%H3808>truth<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H8047>desolate<s%>, even <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>fair<s%>, without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.

<S%H3588>Yes<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6776>acres<s%> of <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1324>bath<s%>, and the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> a <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that they may <S%H7291>follow<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; that <S%H309>continue<s%> until <S%H5399>night<s%>, until <S%H3196>wine<s%> inflame <S%H1814>them<s%>!

And the <S%H3658>harp<s%>, and the <S%H5035>lyre<s%>, the <S%H8596>tabret<s%>, and <S%H2485>flute<s%>, and <S%H3196>wine<s%>, are in their <S%H4960>feasts<s%>: but they <S%H5027>regard<s%> not the <S%H6467>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, neither <S%H7200>consider<s%> the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

Therefore my <S%H5971>people<s%> are gone into <S%H1540>captivity<s%>, because they have no <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: and their <S%H3519>honorable<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> are <S%H7458>famished<s%>, and their <S%H1995>multitude<s%> dried <S%H6704>up<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.

Therefore <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> has <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%>, and <S%H6473>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> without <S%H2706>measure<s%>: and their <S%H1926>glory<s%>, and their <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, and their <S%H7588>pomp<s%>, and he that <S%H5938>rejoices<s%>, shall descend into <S%H3381>it<s%>.

And the mean <S%H120>man<s%> shall be brought <S%H7817>down<s%>, and the mighty <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H8213>humbled<s%>, and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1364>lofty<s%> shall be <S%H8213>humbled<s%>:

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall be <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H410>God<s%> that is <S%H6918>holy<s%> shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
Then shall the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> after their <S%H1699>manner<s%>, and the waste <S%H2723>places<s%> of the fat <S%H4220>ones<s%> shall <S%H1481>strangers<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>.
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and <S%H2403>sin<s%> as it were with a <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H5688>rope<s%>:

That <S%H559>say<s%>, Let him make <S%H4116>speed<s%>, and <S%H2363>hasten<s%> his <S%H4639>work<s%>, that we may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H6098>it<s%>: and let the counsel of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> draw <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%>, that we may know <S%H3045>it<s%>!

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that <S%H559>call<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>; that <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H216>light<s%> for <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; that <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> for <S%H4966>sweet<s%>, and <S%H4966>sweet<s%> for <S%H4751>bitter<s%>!
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H995>prudent<s%> in their own <S%H6440>sight<s%>!
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H4537>mingle<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>:
Which <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6118>for<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%>, and take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the righteous from <S%H6662>him<s%>!

Therefore as the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> the <S%H7179>stubble<s%>, and the <S%H3956>flame<s%> <S%H7503>consumes<s%> the <S%H2842>chaff<s%>, so their <S%H8328>root<s%> shall be as <S%H4716>rottenness<s%>, and their <S%H6525>blossom<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> as <S%H80>dust<s%>: because they have cast <S%H3988>away<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Therefore is the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he has stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5221>them<s%>, and has struck <S%H2022>them<s%>: and the hills did <S%H7264>tremble<s%>, and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> were <S%H5478>torn<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>. For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still<s%>.

And he will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>ensign<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, and will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> unto them from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H935>and<s%>, behold, they shall come with <S%H4120>speed<s%> <S%H7031>swiftly<s%>:

None shall be <S%H5889>weary<s%> nor <S%H3782>stumble<s%> among <S%H5123>them<s%>; none shall slumber nor <S%H3462>sleep<s%>; neither shall the <S%H232>belt<s%> of their <S%H2504>body<s%> be <S%H6605>loosened<s%>, nor the <S%H8288>latchet<s%> of their <S%H5275>shoes<s%> be <S%H5423>broken<s%>:

Whose <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp<s%>, and all their <S%H7198>bows<s%> <S%H1869>bent<s%>, their <S%H5483>horses<s%>' <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> like <S%H6862>flint<s%>, and their <S%H1534>wheels<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>:

Their <S%H7581>roaring<s%> shall be like a <S%H3833>lion<s%>, they shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> like young <S%H3715>lions<s%>: <S%H5098>Yes<s%>, they shall roar, and lay <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and shall carry it away <S%H6403>safe<s%>, and none shall deliver <S%H5337>it<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> they shall <S%H5098>roar<s%> against them like the <S%H5100>roaring<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and if one <S%H5027>look<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%>, behold <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H6862>sorrow<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in the heavens <S%H6183>there<s%>.
